Substance.ingredient.substance[x] (substance[x]):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance#Substance.ingredient.substance[x]Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. name: ConceptMapR5SubstanceElementsForR4Substance
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Substance` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Substance`.
Element `Substance` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.meta`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`, but has no comparisons.
Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
